requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (512 MB) / Intel HD Graphics 2500
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It runs on a potato basically

results.name: Five Nights at Chuck E. Cheese's

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 630 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
